dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Hark! Another pitiful being braves my presence. What twisted motive brings you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power beyond imagination, which you stand in the way of.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ambition veiled in darkness. Typical of creatures like you. Your thirst for power will lead to downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let the battle decide who shall prevail.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A simplistic notion. Violence is your answer to all. So be it. Prepare for obliteration.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no light, especially not yours.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravado till the end. Bold, but foolish. Your resistance melts like wax in the face of the sun.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You are nothing but a shimmering facade of false virtue.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insolence knows no bounds in one so feeble. Your ignorance parallels your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Confront me, and witness the true extent of my power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Confidence blooms amidst the shadows. Your overestimation of self will fuel your own undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your light will wane before the darkness within me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bluster without substance. Darkness is not your ally; it is your master. Embrace your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your righteousness is a thin veil over your impending defeat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words dripping with spite. Challenge accepted, arrogance unending. Dark or light, all shall fall before the annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I care not for your empty words; actions will speak louder.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impatience flares in the presence of power. Your journey ends before it truly begins. Prepare for annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Action defines the victor, silence the vanquished.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Assertions of grandeur, but actions cut deeper. Silence descends as shadows swallow you whole.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your facade of righteousness crumbles before true power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Observant, though ultimately mistaken. The self-righteous often fall hardest. Darkness looms for thee.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with you; let us coexist in our respective dominions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexistence? Laughable. In the domain of light and shadow, one shall always prevail.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Acknowledged. Farewell in that case, and may our paths diverge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Parting words as the paths part. Remember, shadows fade in the presence of brilliance.
